attributes.comment:
Hello,
I understand that you are considering raising the cost for Application and Petition
fee for adoption. I'm sure you already know how expensive adoption can be. It can
also understand the cost of your services need to be raised a bit. The fingerprint
increase seems reasonable, but not for the application and petition services.

If the rates positively needed to be increased, it would be extremely helpful if you
could lower the rates, or even more helpful, extend the I-171 for those of us that
have to wait a bit longer.

Adoption is not an easy process. It is very taxing on everyone involved. It can be
very stressful and emotional for even a short adoption wait. It would be GREATLY
appreciated if our own government would be able to help these families go through
this transition with help and assistance, rather then feel like they have to go it
alone. Though it is difficult to have to wait to start our family, it could be made
much more bearable if the I-171 could be extended for those of us that need it. If
that were possible then I would approve a raise in the cost of the
application/petition fee. Thank you for your time.

Sincerely,
Michelle Edwards
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Michelle Edwards
